author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Make many of the private validation codes for HGCal geometry working for the V10 version

#### PR validation:

Validation plots are made and the first results are shown at the LPC meeting

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:

This is not a backport.
title: Phase2-hgx188 Make changes to do geometry validation of V10
